word: Do the believers who meet in their small assemblies in humble churches or in private houses often look upon this picture framed by the Lord of hosts? . . . What a hope-inspiring picture is this where the Lord is represented as bending down and hearkening to the testimonies borne by His witnesses! What inspiration it should give us to consider the fact that all the heavenly universe is represented as listening with pleasure to the words that are spoken exalting the name of God in the earth. . . .
